metadata.title: CVE-2018-8026 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - untriaged
metadata.description: This vulnerability in Apache Solr 6.0.0 to 6.6.4 and 7.0.0 to 7.3.1 relatesto an XML external entity expansion (XXE) in Solr config files(currency.xml, enumsConfig.xml referred from schema.xml, TIKA parsecontextconfig file). In addition, Xinclude functionality provided in these configfiles is also affected in a similar way. The vulnerability can be used asXXE using file/ftp/http protocols in order to read arbitrary local filesfrom the Solr server or the internal network. The manipulated files can beuploaded as configsets using Solr's API, allowing to exploit thatvulnerability.

criterions.comment: lucene-solr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
